name: moonstone rose afghan square
notes:
moonstone roses are a type of hybrid tea rose that are white with a delicate pink edge on each petal. sometimes it takes a jewelers loop to fully examine the worth of a gemstone. but this jewel of a hybrid tea flower is soooo big, you wonâ€™t need any help to see the impeccable beauty of its classic show form and pearly colors. her many blooms almost look sculpted from fine porcelain. 

the pattern includes step by step color photos. in order to save your printer ink, do not print pages 7 - 16.
